cn.domob.android.ads

类 AdView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.RelativeLayout
          • cn.domob.android.ads.AdView
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent 

    public class AdView
extends android.widget.RelativeLayout

    A class for invoking Domob banner ads.

    Calls and displays banner ads through invoking this class.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • AdView

        public AdView(android.app.Activity context,
      java.lang.String publisherID,
      java.lang.String placementID,
      boolean isRefreshable)
        参数:
        context - context for current activity
        publisherID - publisher ID from official site of Domob
        isRefreshable - whether to refresh automatically or not

      • AdView

        public AdView(android.app.Activity context,
      java.lang.String publisherID,
      java.lang.String placementID)
        Builds ad view.
        参数:
        context - context for current activity
        publisherID - publisher ID from official site of Domob

      • AdView

public AdView(android.app.Activity context,
                 android.util.AttributeSet attrs)
        已过时。 
        Constructor for building ad view through XML file.
        参数:
        context -
        attrs -

    • 方法详细资料

      • setAdSize

        public void setAdSize(java.lang.String size)
        Set ad size, this method should be called before placed on parent view. This method is also limited to use only banner(DomobAdView)
        参数:
        size - size for requesting corresponding ad, generally set with a constant in DomobAdview, adjusting according the density of screen. Please refer to the user guide for details.

      • onWindowFocusChanged

        public void onWindowFocusChanged(boolean hasWindowFocus)
        覆盖:
        onWindowFocusChanged 在类中 android.view.View

      • setCreativeRect

        public void setCreativeRect(int width,
                   int height)
        Sets creative size through ad's response content.
        参数:
        width -
        height -

      • showAd

        public void showAd(DMBaseAdAdapter adapter,
          android.view.animation.AnimationSet[] animationPair)
        Show ad with flipper animation.
        参数:
        webView -
        animationPair - An AnimationSet array which contains inAnimationSet at index 0 and outAnimationSet at index 1.

      • close

        public void close()

      • setSpots

        public void setSpots(java.lang.String spot)
        Sets placement information.

      • setKeyword

        public void setKeyword(java.lang.String keyword)
        Sets keywords when requesting ads.
        参数:
        keyword -

      • setUserGender

        public void setUserGender(java.lang.String gender)
        Sets user's gender.
        参数:
        gender - "male" or "female"

      • setUserBirthdayStr

        public void setUserBirthdayStr(java.lang.String birthday)
        参数:
        birthday - Format:“YYYYMMDD”

      • setUserPostcode

        public void setUserPostcode(java.lang.String pc)
        Sets user's postcode.
        参数:
        pc - string format of user's postcode

      • setRefreshable

        public void setRefreshable(boolean refreshable)
        Sets whether DomobAdview is automatically refreshed or not.
        参数:
        refreshable -

      • setOnAdListener

        @Deprecated
public void setOnAdListener(AdListener adListener)
        已过时。 
        Sets listener for the event of receiving ads.
        参数:
        adListener -

      • setAdEventListener

        public void setAdEventListener(AdEventListener eventListener)
        Sets listener for the callback of receiving ads.
        参数:
        eventListener - instance for AdEventListener, adding own function code depending on needs.

      • requestRefreshAd

        public void requestRefreshAd()
        Request a fresh ad immediately.

      • requestAdForAggregationPlatform

        public void requestAdForAggregationPlatform()
        Interface for mediation platform, requesting ads in background and not refresh ad view.

      • loadUrl

        public void loadUrl(java.lang.String url,
           java.lang.String format)
        Interface for explicit creative url test. Please set mraid url right after initializing Adview.
        参数:
        url - url for mraid ad
        format - "mraid" or "domob"

      • clean

        public void clean()
        Clean and destroy all objects of AdView instance.

      • orientationChanged

        public void orientationChanged()
        This method handle the ad banner rotation when ad type is FLEXIBLE_BANNER and the screen is rotated. When this method is called, SDK will once again confirm whether it is true to rotate the screen, so it is no problem that the value of configChanges is "orientation|keyboard|keyboardHidden" and not is only "orientation"

        public void onProcessActionType(java.lang.String actionType)
